Want to be ready?

Choose what you want to eat now

Choose your meal directly from either our website or app among thousands thousands of dishes already there and almost hundreds coming every week!

Kitchen will receive the order

The chosen restaurant will start preparing your order as soon as they receive the notification, from the customer to the chef, without queues or intermediaries.

Our rider at your door!

When the order is ready, a rider will already be at the restaurant to pick up your meal and bring it hot to your door.
